title: U.S. Stock Futures Little Changed After China Markets Surge
sub_head: Hong Kong stocks jumped after China’s securities regulator moved to remove an audit barrier for U.S. listings
body:
U.S. stock futures wavered between small gains and losses as investors monitored Russia’s war with Ukraine.
Futures for the S&P 500 added 0.2% and contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 gained 0.4% on Monday. Futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average were flat. U.S. stocks edged higher Friday, buoyed by a solid employment report.
